summary: A study in the world of hip-hop, done mostly with interviews, in order to see why it is as popular as it is today and what the future holds.
cast: B-Real|Kurtis Blow|Da Brat|Chuck D|Sean 'Diddy' Combs|Sen D.O.G.|Desiree Densiti|Dr. Dre|E-40|MC Eiht|Grandmaster Caz|Heavy D|Lauryn Hill|Ice-T|Wyclef Jean|Ras Kass|KRS-One|L.V.|Mack 10|Craig Mack|Master P|Method Man|Keith Murray|Nas|The Notorious B.I.G.|Q-Tip|Raekwon|Redman|Busta Rhymes|RZA|DJ Scratch|Erick Sermon|Tupac Shakur|Adario Strange|Suave|Too $hort
title: Rhyme & Reason
